start.message: Welcome to EchoFinder 2! I'm Finn, and I'm here to help you find any messages that you want to revisit, or summarise message threads of your choosing.

help.message:
To search for a message, type /search, followed by any details you remember about the message.

To summarise a message thread, type /tldr, followed by the number of messages you would like to summarise.

examples.message:
An example of the command you can use to search for a message is "/search sports". This will search for any messages that are related to sports.

An example of the command you can use to summarise a message thread is "/tldr 10". This will summarise the last 10 messages in the thread.
